Html:

pls help me...........

Hi Radioman.

Could you please post the code or the demo? I have some poblems with GMap - the map is not blank but it says "We are sorry we don't have imagery at this level fot this region". However, the demo project I have downloaded with the libraries works good. The way I ty to run the map is (after placing it on the canvas):

this.gMapControl1.MapType = GMap.NET.MapType.GoogleMap;
this.gMapControl1.MinZoom = 1;
this.gMapControl1.MaxZoom = 5;
this.gMapControl1.Zoom = 5;
this.gMapControl1.CurrentPosition = new GMap.NET.PointLatLng(53.6961334816182, 17.2985095977783);
this.gMapControl1.ReloadMap();

I would be very grateful for any suggerstions.
